attributes.action: scrap the e-petition project and stop wasting tax payers money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Transport Secretary has made it clear that he will ignore the £1.6m+ signature on the e-petition not to introduce road funding. As it is clear that this government pays lip service to popular opinion no further money should be wasted on this experiment

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
